comments.text:
I think this approach for Pro is probably a result of the issues we saw with Outer Worlds 2 and PSSR at launch anyway. It had some issues and honestly better safe than sorry is probably the approach I’d go with as well.

But you guys didn’t cover uncapped mode? Because in Balanced Mode the Pro pretty much locks to 60, not 40. And even in Quality Mode it can get up into the 50’s. Balanced on Pro is 100 percent the way to go here. Quality settings at 60 fps. If you have a 120hz screen.

comments.text: I'm not a fan of these interview/podcast kind of episodes. they are inherently less structured, information is less dense, harder to find and not presented as well.
